text.text_translated:
Social media, magazines and shop windows show people things to buy daily.  
British consumers buy more clothes and shoes than before.  
Online shopping makes it easy to buy without thinking.  
Major brands sell cheap clothes, so people use them like disposable items.  
People wear the clothes only two or three times.  
Then they throw them away.  

British consumers are people who live in Britain and buy things.  
Disposable items are things people use only a few times.
